prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with an event chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What were Stefan's true thoughts and feelings when I stepped off the S-bahn and met him the first time?

Since this chart is drawn up for a specific past event, Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant in this chart, and I should be represented by his 3rd house (family connection). Due to the lack of planet significators in the third house, I should be represented by Jupiter, the third house ruler.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the chart using event chart principles (I believe they are similar to horary principles). Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a methodical listing of the event chart’s key data, grouped by category, in alignment with horary/event principles and your instructions:

1. Core Significators
 • Stefan (represented by the Ascendant): 27° Libra
  – Venus in Libra is conjunct the Ascendant at 26°36′ (orb ~1°)
  – Additional aspects to the Ascendant:
   ◦ Moon opposition Ascendant at 2° orb
   ◦ Pluto square Ascendant at 2° orb
   ◦ Chiron opposition Ascendant at 5° orb
   ◦ Jupiter trine Ascendant at 7° orb
 • You (Melissa, represented by the 3rd house):
  – Third house begins at 24° Sagittarius (noting Pluto is contained in this house per the chart’s listing)
  – With no other significators present in the house, the ruler is Jupiter
  – Jupiter is at 20°44′ Gemini (per planetary listing)
   ◦ Note: House boundaries place Jupiter in the 8th house as shown; for the event focus, Jupiter is taken as the representative for the 3rd house energy.

2. Planetary Positions (listing the main planets as provided)
 • Sun: 27°50′ Virgo
 • Moon: 29°11′ Aries
 • Mercury: 18°51′ Virgo
 • Venus: 26°36′ Libra
 • Mars: 9°02′ Cancer
 • Jupiter: 20°44′ Gemini
 • Saturn: 15°06′ Pisces (retrograde)
 • Uranus: 27°06′ Taurus (retrograde)
 • Neptune: 28°32′ Pisces (retrograde)
 • Pluto: 29°45′ Capricorn (retrograde)
 • North Node: 6°56′ Aries (retrograde)
 • Chiron: 22°17′ Aries (retrograde)
 • Ascendant: 27° Libra
 • MC: 5° Leo
 • IC: 5° Aquarius

3. Major Aspects (relevant with low-orb emphasis, as these are the strongest influencers)
 • Moon square Pluto (orb ~0°)
 • Sun trine Uranus (orb ~0°)
 • North Node sextile IC (orb 1°)
 • Neptune sextile Pluto (orb 1°)
 • Uranus sextile Neptune (orb 1°)
 • Sun opposition Neptune (orb 1°)
 • Venus conjunct Ascendant (orb 1°)
 • North Node trine MC (orb 1°)
 • Jupiter sextile Chiron (orb 2°)
 • Pluto square Ascendant (orb 2°)
 • Mercury square Jupiter (orb 2°)
 • Moon opposition Ascendant (orb 2°)
 • Uranus trine Pluto (orb 2°)
 • Sun trine Pluto (orb 2°)
 • Mars square North Node (orb 3°)
 • Venus square Pluto (orb 3°)
 • Mercury opposition Saturn (orb 3°)
 • Moon opposition Venus (orb 3°)
 • Venus opposition Chiron (orb 4°)
 • Jupiter square Saturn (orb 5°)
 • Chiron opposition Ascendant (orb 5°)
 • Moon square IC (orb 6°)
 • Moon square MC (orb 6°)
 • Pluto opposition MC (orb 6°)
 • Pluto conjunction IC (orb 6°)
 • Mars trine Saturn (orb 6°)
 • Venus trine Jupiter (orb 6°)
 • Pluto square Chiron (orb 7°)
 • Sun square Jupiter (orb 7°)
 • Moon conjunction Chiron (orb 7°)
 • Neptune trine MC (orb 7°)
 • Jupiter trine Ascendant (orb 7°)
 • Uranus trine IC (orb 8°)
 • Sun trine IC (orb 8°)

4. Patterns and Configurations
 • Grand Trine:
  – Sun in Virgo, IC in Aquarius, Uranus in Taurus, Pluto in Capricorn
 • Kite Formation:
  – Incorporates the Grand Trine plus Neptune in Pisces
 • T‑Squares (three notable instances):
  – T‑Square involving MC (5° Leo), Moon (29° Aries), IC (5° Aquarius) with Pluto (29° Capricorn) as the apex or stressor
  – T‑Square with Ascendant (27° Libra), Pluto (29° Capricorn), Chiron (22° Aries), Moon (29° Aries), and Venus (26° Libra)
  – T‑Square involving Mercury (18° Virgo), Jupiter (20° Gemini), and Saturn (15° Pisces)
 • Yod:
  – Formed by Venus in Libra, Neptune in Pisces, and Uranus in Taurus, with the Ascendant (27° Libra) acting as the base

5. Additional Special Features
 • Retrograde motions shape the event: Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, Pluto, North Node, and Chiron are all retrograde, suggesting reflective or internalized energies at play
 • The Moon was a waning gibbous, marking a time shortly after a full manifestation
 • Dominant Cardinal mode among the inner planets, which underscores a dynamic, action-oriented energy
 • The right hemisphere (right of the MC–IC axis) holds most inner planets, hinting at an outward, expressive energy flow
 • Venus is rising while the Moon is descending, emphasizing interplay between personal charm and instinctual emotion

This comprehensive list captures the critical elements needed for your later interpretive analysis regarding Stefan’s thoughts and feelings at the moment of your meeting.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
The chart shows Stefan at the moment of your arrival was governed by a dual nature. His Ascendant in Libra, accentuated by Venus in close conjunction, indicates that his immediate, conscious reaction was one of charm and aesthetic appreciation—he recognized an allure in your presence that resonated with his own refined sensibilities. This aspect suggests that, on the surface, he was positively attracted and perhaps even delighted by what he perceived in you.

Simultaneously, however, the Moon opposition Ascendant and Pluto square Ascendant introduce a layer of internal complexity. The Moon’s opposition reveals that beneath his outward charm lurked an emotional tension—a stirring of feelings that might have unsettled his usual equilibrium. With Pluto’s square there, we see the presence of a transformative, even disruptive force. Stefan’s inner world was wrestling with a deep, perhaps subconscious, reaction: part admiration intertwined with apprehension or fear of unforeseen depths being stirred. There is an implication of intensity here that goes beyond mere surface attraction.

Additional aspects lend further detail. Mercury square Jupiter indicates that his initial cognitive processing may have been clouded by over-optimistic or exaggerated interpretations, as if his mind was striving to make sense of the magnetic qualities you projected, yet perhaps overreaching in its conclusions. Meanwhile, the assured trines—Sun trine Uranus and Sun trine Pluto—suggest an underlying, if subtle, readiness for change and transformation catalyzed by your encounter, even if he was not immediately conscious of it.

Considering your representation through Jupiter as the significator in the third house, the interaction appears to have been charged with an element of intellectual and communicational expansion. This connection likely amplified the initial spark: his attraction was not merely physical or superficial, but anticipated a potential for intriguing, even transformative, dialogue.

Based strictly on these elements, the indication is that Stefan’s true thoughts and feelings at that precise moment were a blend of immediate sensory pleasure and an undercurrent of intense emotional disturbance—an admiration softened by an almost instinctive warning of transformative emotional consequences.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, madam. That's pretty accurate. Does the chart show anything about how I was feeling in that moment?

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Melissa Gale, your representation through Jupiter highlights a state of lively, inquisitive energy at the moment of your encounter. Jupiter in Gemini suggests you were mentally active, eager to explore and understand the situation. There’s a pronounced urge for communication and connection, which may have amplified your initial intrigue.

At the same time, the challenging aspect of Mercury square Jupiter indicates that your thoughts were racing—perhaps leading to an over-interpretation of details. This dynamic could have left you feeling both excited by the potential and slightly unsettled by the rapid, sometimes conflicting impressions you received. Overall, the chart indicates you experienced a blend of intellectual curiosity tempered with the need to discern subtle, perhaps ambiguous signals in that meeting.
